languages.text: Лорд-капитан приподнимается под ворохом катетеров и, периодически вдыхая через маску, начинает говорить о человеческой стойкости, о тех испытаниях, которые уже преодолел экипаж и которые ему еще предстоит преодолеть в борьбе за корабль.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан приподнимается под ворохом катетеров и, периодически вдыхая через маску, начинает говорить о человеческой стойкости, о тех испытаниях, которые уже преодолел экипаж и которые ему еще предстоит преодолеть в борьбе за корабль.

languages.text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан приподнимается под ворохом катетеров и, периодически вдыхая через маску, начинает говорить о человеческой стойкости, о тех испытаниях, которые уже преодолел экипаж и которые ему еще предстоит преодолеть в борьбе за корабль.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, sepultad{mf|o|a} por una montaña de catéteres, se incorpora y, respirando a través de una máscara, empieza a elogiar la tenacidad humana y a hacer hincapié en las duras pruebas que la tripulación ya ha superado, así como las que están por venir para salvar la nave.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, sepultad{mf|o|a} por una montaña de catéteres, se incorpora y, respirando a través de una máscara, empieza a elogiar la tenacidad humana y a hacer hincapié en las duras pruebas que la tripulación ya ha superado, así como las que están por venir para salvar la nave.

languages.text: 尽管身上插满了导管，领主舰长努力撑起了身体，时不时地透过面罩喘息着。{mf|他|她}开始讲述人类的顽强精神，讲述船员们在拯救飞船的斗争中已经克服的考验，以及依然存在的问题。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: 尽管身上插满了导管，领主舰长努力撑起了身体，时不时地透过面罩喘息着。{mf|他|她}开始讲述人类的顽强精神，讲述船员们在拯救飞船的斗争中已经克服的考验，以及依然存在的问题。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、大量のカテーテルを繋がれた体を支えて起きあがり、時折マスク越しに息を吐きながら人間の粘り強さ、クルーがすでに乗り越えてきた試練、そして船を救う闘いでこれから待ち構える試練について語り始めた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、大量のカテーテルを繋がれた体を支えて起きあがり、時折マスク越しに息を吐きながら人間の粘り強さ、クルーがすでに乗り越えてきた試練、そして船を救う闘いでこれから待ち構える試練について語り始めた。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain der unter Kathetern begraben ist, stützt sich auf und beginnt, durch eine Maske zu atmen, von der menschlichen Zähigkeit zu sprechen, von den Prüfungen, die die Besatzung bereits überwunden hat und denen, die noch vor ihr liegen, um das Schiff zu retten.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

languages.text: {mf|Enfoui|Enfouie} sous une montagne de cathéters, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'assoit dans son lit et prend la parole, en s'interrompant de temps à autre pour respirer dans un masque à oxygène. {mf|Il|Elle} parle de la ténacité humaine, des épreuves que l'équipage a déjà surmontées et de celles qui l'attendent encore dans sa lutte pour sauver le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Enfoui|Enfouie} sous une montagne de cathéters, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'assoit dans son lit et prend la parole, en s'interrompant de temps à autre pour respirer dans un masque à oxygène. {mf|Il|Elle} parle de la ténacité humaine, des épreuves que l'équipage a déjà surmontées et de celles qui l'attendent encore dans sa lutte pour sauver le vaisseau.

languages.text: Bir sonda yığını altında uzanan Lord Kaptan doğruluyor ve arada sırada maskesinden nefes alarak insan azminden, mürettebatın şimdiye kadar üstesinden geldiği zorluklardan ve gemiyi kurtarma mücadelelerinde hâlâ önlerinde olan güçlüklerden bahsetmeye başlıyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain, buried under a mound of catheters, props {mf|himself|herself} up and, taking breaths through a mask now and then, begins to speak of human tenacity, of the trials that the crew have already overcome and those that still lie ahead in their struggle to save the ship.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonda yığını altında uzanan Lord Kaptan doğruluyor ve arada sırada maskesinden nefes alarak insan azminden, mürettebatın şimdiye kadar üstesinden geldiği zorluklardan ve gemiyi kurtarma mücadelelerinde hâlâ önlerinde olan güçlüklerden bahsetmeye başlıyor.
